column3:
此処は其方自身の記憶が生み出した
夢幻の異空なれば…
column4:
This illusory realm was created from
the depths of your memories...

column3:
眼前に現れし敵は己の恐れが生み出したる
越えるべき壁…
column4:
The enemy you shall face is a product
of the fear that dwells within. You must
overcome this fear to proceed.

column3:
この戦いは魂の試練…
我の与えし道具のみで見事勝利してみせよ
column4:
This battle is a trial of the soul.
You must emerge victorious using
only the tools provided.
